meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

presenters: Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management
Department of Information and Technology Services
Department of Transportation and Public Works

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the December 11, 2024 City Council Meeting
Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled, David Walters, et al. v. City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $600,000.00 - Financing: Liability Reserve Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled, Donna Jean Berry v. Precious Yusha Mangum and City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $55,000.00 - Financing: Liability Reserve Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of protective gas masks
agenda_items.description: Estimated amount not to exceed $520,725.15 - Financing: 2023 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative Fund and General Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize a three-year sole source services agreement for an open-source intelligence solution
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $299,999.58 - Financing: FY 2024 BJA OJP Byrne Discretionary Grant Program Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 24-0842 for an Interlocal Agreement with TxDOT
agenda_items.description: Modify the City’s estimated share of the project costs from $1,234,600.00 to $1,321,500.00 - Amount of $1,321,500.00 - Financing: Aviation Construction Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize a one-year policy for excess workers’ compensation insurance
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $750,000.00 - Financing: Workers’ Compensation Fund

financial_items.description: Settlement of the lawsuit styled, David Walters, et al. v. City of Dallas
